CustomField.description: This field is used on the Clinical Triage Progress Note. Patient will call back if symptoms worsen or fail to improve over 48 hours; emergency department warnings reviewed. True if medical practitioner reviewed emergency department warnings during virtual visit
CustomField.inlineHelpText: *Caller/Patient* advised to call facilities VA Clinical Contact Center or seek immediate medical attention for new or worsening symptoms
CustomField.label: Provided guidance for worsening symptoms
